Html:
Hi,

First of all, thanks for developing and sharing this package.This has helped me a lot in my applications.

I am consuming this package in one of my MVC 4 application, and hence facing issues as MVC 4 is referencing System.Web.Razor 2.0.0.0, and RazorEngine package is referencing version 1.0.0.0.. this making the live deployment difficult.

Could you please let us know if there are any plans to release RazorEngine package for S.W.R. V 2.0.0.0?

Thanks

Nirman
